title: [Yegharren Plain, Cliff Face]
description: The sunlit plain of grass extends off to the west as far as the eye can see.  A constant wind blows down from the rugged crags above, carrying a slight chill and a touch of humid mist in the air.  The gliding form of a huge bird circling overhead casts a momentary shadow over the grass.

The moonlit plain of grass extends off to the west as far as the eye can see.  A constant wind blows down from the rugged crags above, carrying a slight chill and a touch of humid mist in the air.  The gliding form of a huge bird circling overhead casts a momentary shadow over the grass.
